<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a permission set</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/iam/v1/permission_sets/{name}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the details for a specific permission set.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"description":"A unique identifier.","example":"log_viewer:1234567890","maxLength":256,"minLength":12,"readOnly":true,"title":"ID for custom Role","type":"string"}}},"description":"A unique identifier for a permission_set.","in":"path","name":"name","required":true}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response - returns a single `permission_set`.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"aggregated_permissions"} required={false} schemaName={"undefined[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Identifies all of the permissions in the permission set, as well\nas all the permissions defined for the current TSG's child TSGs.\n","items":{},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"children"} required={false} schemaName={"undefined[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"All of the child permission sets contained in the parent permission set.\n","items":{},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={true} schemaName={""} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Descriptive text displayed by the UI.\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"display_name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Label used in the UI to identify the permission set.\n","example":"Identity and Access Management Read /  Write","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Permission set's unique identifier. Used in API calls to identify this permission\nset.\n","example":"iam_read_write","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"parent"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Name of the permission set's parent.\n","example":"iam_all","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"permissions"} required={false} schemaName={"undefined[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"All permissions contained by the permission set.\n","items":{},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"aggregated_permissions\": [\n    \"iam.role.get\",\n    \"iam.role.list\",\n    \"iam.accessPolicy.get\",\n    \"iam.accessPolicy.list\",\n    \"iam.group.create\",\n    \"iam.group.update\",\n    \"iam.group.delete\"\n  ],\n  \"children\": [\n    \"iam.access_policy\"\n  ],\n  \"description\": \"Grants all Permissions used on the page \\\"Identity and Access Management\\\".\",\n  \"display_name\": \"Identity and Access Management\",\n  \"name\": \"iam.management\",\n  \"parent\": \"common_services\",\n  \"permissions\": [\n    \"iam.role.get\",\n    \"iam.role.list\",\n    \"iam.group.create\",\n    \"iam.group.update\",\n    \"iam.group.delete\"\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
